name: RTCPeerConnection.connectionState
description: The read-only connectionState property of the RTCPeerConnection interface indicates the current state of the peer connection by returning one of the string values specified by the enum RTCPeerConnectionState.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCPeerConnection.connectionState' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
